content: üîé¬† vbetFTN.COM¬† üîéü•Å "Listen up, ladies and gentlemen! Calling all football fanatics and expert bettors!" ü•Å   Hey everyone!Get ready for some excitement with the USL Championship predictors Challenge. We're excited to announce that VBET is the official premium sponsor of the Ukrainians National Team, and they've brought this awesome challenge to our community.How to participate:- Predict the 1 / X / 2 of each match- Include your vbetFTN userID in your reply- One correct answer gets you +1 point to the leaderboard- Any participant who has the most correct answers takes the prize pool- For the tiebreaker guess the total goals scored for all the matches combinedRewards:- 1st: $50 free bet- 2nd: $30 free bet- 3rd: $20 free betMatches:- Hartford Athletic vs Detroit- El Paso vs Las Vegas Lights- San Diego Loyal vs San AntonioLet's have a blast!
